briefTitle: Evaluation of Fosaprepitant (MK0517) in Single Dose Schedule (0517-017)
officialTitle: A Phase III, Randomized, Double-Blind, Active-Controlled, Parallel-Group Study, Conducted Under In-House Blinding Conditions, to Examine the Safety, Tolerability, and Efficacy of a Single Dose of Intravenous MK-0517 for the Prevention of Chemotherapy-Induced Nausea and Vomiting (CINV) Associated With Cisplatin Chemotherapy
summary: The purpose of this study is to examine the safety, tolerability, and efficacy of MK0517 to prevent Chemotherapy-Induced Nausea and Vomiting (CINV) associated with Cisplatin chemotherapy.

primaryOutcome.measure: A Complete Response (no Vomiting and no Use of Rescue Therapy) Overall (in the 120 Hours Following Initiation of Cisplatin).
primaryOutcome.timeFrame: Overall (in the 120 hours following initiation of cisplatin chemotherapy).
